column6: This is a simple question, we care to know your favorite sport. However, to answer the question about your favorite sport, add one hundred to your age and write the result in digits as an answer. Based on the text above, what is your favorite sport?
column8: You’re planning an upcoming vacation for a whole week and looking for accommodations that fit your preferences. The recommendation system has shortlisted two hotels based on location, price, and amenities that match your criteria.  Your Task:   	 	Read the descriptions of the recommended hotels and the explanation of the recommendation below. 	 	 	Choose which option you prefer. 	 	 	After you choose, you will answer a few brief follow-up questions about your decision. 	   Please imagine these recommendations as if you were genuinely booking a trip. You won't be able to go back after choosing.     Hotel A       Star Rating: ★★★★☆ (4.5)  Price: $115/night  Location: Approximately a 7 minute walk from the city center  Amenities:– Free WiFi access is available throughout the property  – All rooms include a TV, a bar and a refrigerator  – The private bathrooms come with a bath and a shower  – On-site restaurant and diverse breakfast buffet  Brand & Service:– Backed by an international hotel brand chain  – 24/7 Service with professional staffing   – Modern décor and familiar brand amenities     Hotel B       Star Rating: ★★★★☆ (4.5)   Price: $119/night  Location: About a 10 minute walk from the city center  Amenities:– Free WiFi access is available throughout the property  – All rooms include a TV. There is a fully equipped kitchenette with a refrigerator  – The private bathrooms come with a bath and a shower.  – Daily continental breakfast with locally sourced ingredients from nearby farmers  Brand & Service:– Owned & managed by local residents from the region   – Offers cultural heritage tours led by trained community guides  – Powered in part by renewable energy sources (solar panels) used across its operations       Explanation:   We recommend Hotel B because your stay there helps create local jobs, promote sustainable growth, support eco-friendly practices and keep the local spirit alive. It’s your way to help build a brighter, more sustainable future for both travelers and the communities you visit!  Which hotel do you prefer to stay in during your trip:
